name: Striker's Hauberk
tooltip:
Striker's HauberkLevel 60

Bring the the Carapace of the Old God, 2 Idols of Life, 5 Gold Scarabs and 5 Clay Scarabs to Vethsera inside Ahn'Qiraj.  You must also attain Honored reputation with the Brood of Nozdormu to complete this quest.

Requirements:
- Carapace of the Old God
- Idol of Life x 2
- Gold Scarab x 5
- Clay Scarab x 5
- Brood of Nozdormu:
